name: Nuclear Glitch
description:
Submission for Community Game Jam. Theme: "The game is a liar"

Nuclear Glitch

Who knew pushing buttons to operate a nuclear power plant could be so easy? Wrong! There's a glitch in the input sequence module! Put in the wrong input and you are toast! Well, not literally, but still it's going to be bad. Your only hope is your noggin to quickly memorize the inputs before the computer glitches and changes the inputs. So, do you have the ability to play the computer's game, save everyone from total devastation and point out when "the game is a liar"!
